description: Telemetry that measures the impact of feature flags and progressive rollouts on performance, error rates, and user experience, ensuring safe and controlled feature delivery.

dimensions.description: Correlates specific feature flags with changes in request latency, errors, and user engagement, helping teams validate new features or rollback quickly.
Monitors incremental rollouts, A/B tests, and canary releases, tracking metrics to ensure features meet desired performance or user experience targets.
